title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the position expression

1 point is earned for the trapezoidal sum

1 point is earned for position at time t = 12

s A (12)= s A (2)+ ∫ 2 12 v A (t)dt =300+ ∫ 2 12 v A (t)dt ∫ 2 12 v A (t)dt ≈3⋅ 100+40 2 +3⋅ 40−120 2 +4⋅ −120−150 2                      =−450 s A (12)≈300−450=−150 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@A652@

The position of Train A at time t = 12 minutes is approximately 150 meters west of Origin Station.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for implicit differentiation of distance relationship

1 point is earned for the answer

Let x be train A's position, y train B's position, and z the distance between train A and train B.

z 2 = x 2 + y 2 ⇒2z dz dt =2x dx dt +2y dy dt x=300, y=400⇒z=500 v B ( 2 )=−20+120+25=125 500 dz dt =( 300 )( 100 )+( 400 )( 125 ) dz dt = 80000 500 =160 meters per minute MathType@MTEF@5@5@@A872@
